mdRecord.dcterms:title: Fiduciary Accounts: Guardianship of Mary M. Graham (now Gray)
mdRecord.dcterms:description: Guardianship of Mary M. Graham (now Gray) John W. Gray, Husband of Mary Graham Joseph F. Graham, Guardian until 05.13.1883 when Mary Reached the age of 21 Years Recorded in Ledger Book 2, page 236 in Floyd County Courthouse
mdRecord.dcterms:subject: Court Records
mdRecord.dcterms:provenance: The Circuit Court of Floyd County
Virginia Polytechnic Institute and State University. University Libraries
